sportsbook.title: SPORTSBOOK API INTEGRATION
sportsbook.description: Our iframe integration offers a quick, efficient solution for iGaming aggregators, platforms, and operators who need a Sportsbook or want to upgrade an existing one. With Digicetra's iframe integration, set up and launch your Sportsbook seamlessly.

features.firstFeature: Fully Automated Operations for effortless management
features.thirdFeature: Top Betting Options to satisfy diverse customer interests
features.fourthFeature: Complete Customization of all configurations for unique branding

sportsbook.learnMore: Full information about Sportsbook API Integration

whiteLabel.title: WHITE LABEL
whiteLabel.description: Digicetra's White Label solution provides a fully customizable, ready-to-launch Sportsbook platform, ideal for brands aiming to enter the iGaming market swiftly and without the complexity of technical development.

features.firstFeature: Customizable Platform tailored to your brand
features.secondFeature: Fast Market Entry with minimal setup
features.thirdFeature: Wide Range of Integrations for extensive functionality
features.fourthFeature: Scalable Architecture that grows with your business needs

turnKey.title: TURNKEY
turnKey.description: Our Turnkey solution is a fully managed Sportsbook platform, guiding brands from setup through daily operations with comprehensive support to make market entry smooth and successful.

features.firstFeature: Fully Managed Service with minimal hands-on effort
features.secondFeature: Operational Support to simplify everyday management
features.thirdFeature: High-Performance Platform for peak efficiency and reliability
features.fourthFeature: End-to-End Solution providing everything your brand needs
